translations: v．扭伤：损伤关节周围的韧带，通常是因为突然扭曲或过度伸展。
· She fell and ended up spraining her ankle.
她摔倒了，结果扭伤了脚踝。

sentences.sentence: She fell badly, spraining her ankle, and had to retire.
sentences.translation: 她摔得很重，扭伤了脚踝，只好退出比赛。

sentences.sentence: He ended up spraining his wrist.
One entire year will be spraining away.
sentences.translation: 又一完整的年即将闪去。
